metadata.title: CVE-2017-9078 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The server in Dropbear before 2017.75 might allow post-authentication rootremote code execution because of a double free in cleanup of TCP listenerswhen the -a option is enabled.

criterions.comment: dropbear: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
